Type.Name: KeyPressEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void KeyPressEventHandler (object o, Gtk.KeyPressEventArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the KeyPressEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the KeyPressEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the KeyPressEventHandler is removed from the event.
